comment: @Richard-ModernDrinking and I had a tasting last night where we shared a few drams with each other.  I bought over the unusual hard to find non-Scottish whiskies.  This was one of mine I shared.  Taste really young.  Almost like craft American whiskey.  Dates and fig.  Light and clean, but just too youthful . The climate in Finland warrants a bit more in the cask.  This didn’t make it to my top 5 or 6 out of the 12 I had
